column5: Got the Christmas flyer from Tromblys in Orillia yesterday, a quick check and I was just about to sprint up there and get me a new Aqua Vu Micro camera with the DVR. It's on page 13 listed at $299, would be a super price.  Instead of leaving rubber launch strips through Angus, I made the phone call,  like usual, if it looks to good to be true, it is a misprint.    Ah well saved the time and gas and maybe someone else that was looking to get one cheap.
You could alwas try a price match from Canadian Tire or Bass Pro.  Not sure if they call for evenry price match.
It ended up being the wrong picture, the wrong model and the wrong price.  I'm not saying bait and switch,   but ya never know.
There always seems to be a misprint or 2 in their flyers. They have lured me in to buy shotgun shells a couple of times that are the wrong picture shell length and shot size.
